current_instrument_status.comment: 3 errors, green laser temp out of range, length error, and a pump error. Production flowcell on board.

instrument_status.comment: 3 errors, green laser temp out of range, length error, and a pump error. Production flowcell on board.
Flowcell chiller checked and topped up. Ready to run.
Oasis chiller checked out and functioning correctly. This is the first time this instrument has errored, will replace chiller if error persists.
Oasis chiller warning. Operation timed out.
Incorrect settings in Run Parameters. Corrected, run started.
Unable to start the run as insufficient disk space on drive D error is generated. Drive D appears to be empty? Please investigate as run is ready to go.
Laser engine upgraded. Ready to run.
Laser power check carried out due to low intensities on FBR. Power level found to be below minimum specification on both read and green so taking down to replace laser engine.
Thermal station position adjusted slightly, and peltier power cable manipulated so that station sits more squarely.
Varience seen from near side RH corner as it peltier is not making full contact with FC. Also seen on last run 4885. Please could you check it before we reload instrument. Now on C115/152.
Replaced front manifold. Ran prime recipe-all OK.
Syringes 6,7,8 drawing air during priming reagents.
can lane 7 be checked. Failure on last run, not improved by re hyb. Lane 7 waste lower than other lanes ( 1ml short over 18 cycles monitored. Not much, but worth a check due to the failure.
No bubbles observed during testing. Putting instrument back up to be washed.
Constant air bubbles when priming through the pr2 after seating flowcell.Air bubbles are seen coming into the flowcell from the inlet tube, so not manifold issue.
Kloehn manifold threads cleaned and syringe replaced with new. Ready to run.
Syringe 4 is leaking from the top. See previous instrument annotations. Now on C124/216.
Coolent block removed, cleaned and re-assembled (silicon sealent used on barbs). Stage flatness/tilt checked all ok.
Coolant is leaking into tray inside instrument.
GA2x upgrade complete. NaOH wash required prior to next run.
PE tubing replaced as slightly crushed
only primed 7ml on PEM Reagents, 9ml on 1st Waters, 8ml on last water prime - also possible focus assist issue - please check
Kloehn syringe valve replaced with new (lane2). Run wash recipes, checked volumes all ok.
Syringe 2 pulling air. Noticed during postwash as dispenced only 35mls.
Instrument has passed install validation. Lanes 1,2 and 6 failed due to a Kloehn pump error, repaired.
Validation run complete. Passes acceptance criteria, awaiting signoff.
Validation run complete. Passes acceptance criteria, awaiting signoff.
